answers.answer: Medical recovery, physical medicine, and rehabilitation services are offered to insured persons.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medicine-and-rehabilitation-services and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Physical medicine and rehabilitation services can be delivered on an outpatient or inpatient basis.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medicine-and-rehabilitation-services and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Outpatient physical medicine and rehabilitation services are provided in treatment bases, including those found in balneo-climatic resorts.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medicine-and-rehabilitation-services and read the section under 'Outpatient Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation in Treatment Bases'.

answers.answer: A typical series of treatments includes specific procedures such as physiotherapy, hydrotherapy, massage, and aerosols.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medicine-and-rehabilitation-services and read the section under 'Outpatient Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation in Treatment Bases'.

answers.answer: Specific physical medicine and rehabilitation procedures such as mineral baths, natural skunks, and mud wraps are exclusively performed in the treatment bases of balneo-climatic resorts.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medicine-and-rehabilitation-services and read the section under 'Outpatient Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation in Treatment Bases'.

answers.answer: The duration and flow of specific physical medicine and rehabilitation procedures are determined by the physical medicine and rehabilitation specialist, according to the Plan of specific physical medicine and rehabilitation procedures.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medicine-and-rehabilitation-services and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Insured persons, both children and adults, are entitled to specific outpatient physical medicine and rehabilitation procedures for a maximum period of 21 days per year.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medicine-and-rehabilitation-services and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Children aged 0-18 with a confirmed diagnosis of cerebral palsy are covered for a maximum of 42 days of specific physical medicine and rehabilitation procedures per year.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medicine-and-rehabilitation-services and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: A maximum of 4 specific physical medicine and rehabilitation procedures are typically covered per day of treatment in a series.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medicine-and-rehabilitation-services and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The Plan of specific physical medicine and rehabilitation procedures dictates the periods and flow of treatments, and specialists use it to recommend how procedures can be divided into sessions.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medicine-and-rehabilitation-services and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: A patient's specific physical medicine and rehabilitation procedures can be divided into a maximum of two sessions, depending on the underlying condition, upon the recommendation of the specialist in the Specific Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation Procedures Plan.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medicine-and-rehabilitation-services and read the page carefully.
